p: The leaves of L. montevidensis were collected in the Medicinal Plants Garden of the Regional University of Cariri—URCA, Crato—CE Brazil (7°22′ S; 39°28′ W and 492 m above sea level), at 9:30 am. After identification, a voucher was deposited in the HCDAL (Herbarium Dárdano de Andrade Lima-URCA) (Crato, Brazil), with number #7518. The leaves were dried in the shade.
